content:
The enemy struck a rocket strike on Odessa, as a result of the attack is known about three victims.

About thisreportedHead of Odessa Ova Oleg Kiper.

According to him, as of now - three affected women. Fortunately, the wounds are not serious.

The head of the Ova also noted that there is damage to civilian infrastructure, knocked out the glass. All relevant services work.

“There is no electricity in Odessa in Odessa in Odessa. Experts do their best and impossible to return the light from the homes of Odessa. We keep calm, charge the return and believe in the Armed Forces, ”Oleg Kiper emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinform, in KievendedEmergency and rescue work after rocket attack.
title: Missile blow to Odessa: More than 300,000 residents were left without electricity
description: This was reported by the head of the Odessa Ova Oleg Kiper. According to him, as of now —...
author: Army Inform
